title: Avocado and Greek Yogurt Chicken
directions: Preheat oven to 425ÂºF. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Cut chicken breasts into bite-sized pieces. In a small bowl, combine mashed avocado, Greek yogurt, minced garlic, and spices. Put chicken pieces into the avocado/yogurt mixture and stir to coat. Arrange the chicken on baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes.
*Not a big fan of spicy food? Feel free to decrease the amount of cayenne pepper used.
ingredients: 1/2 lbs. chicken breast, skinless, organic, free-range2 oz. avocado, fresh, organic6 tbs. yogurt, greek, plain, full-fat, plain, organic1 clove garlic, fresh, organic1 tsp. paprika, organic1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper, powder,
